choices.answer: A meteor shower.
Haley's Comet
Global Warming

questions.question: The author compares the blooming of the desert flowers in 1998 to what other natural phenomenon

choices.answer: There are even more beautiful flowers than experts predicted
Some of the flowers had gold and platinum colors
The author has sold a lot of records.
She won an award for her gardern

questions.question: What does the author mean by "This year they predicted gold, but it's already gone platinum."

choices.answer: There was no dialogue in this passage.
Dialogue adds positivity to any piece of writing.
Some of her friends had some good things to say.
To make the passage more relatable to the reader.

questions.question: Why does the author use a bit of dialogue in her essay?
Why does the author call the different kinds of rain "male" and "female"?

choices.answer: She feels the Earth is made up of different genders.
To make the natural world seem more alive.
She doesn't want to be sexist.
None of these.
...because understanding nature doesn't remove the mystery.
She doesn't understand what happened with the flowers.
She loves getting roses from her husband.
Nature is perfect.

questions.question: Why does the author end the passage by saying "The flowers will go on mystifying us."

choices.answer: ...there are too many variables to make a good prediction.
...the flowers haven't died.
...there is not water.
...there is no sun.

questions.question: To prognosticate the next big desert bloom is difficult because...

choices.answer: ...of the sand.
...too much rain causes floods.
...it benefits the seeds waiting in the Earth.
...at night it gets cold.

questions.question: In the desert the rain is considered a benefaction because...

choices.answer: ...it talks about the rain.
...because the animals have a hard time in the desert.
...it explains how plants survive in the desert.
...because the desert is hot.

questions.question: Kingslover's essay could be called a botanical essay because...

choices.answer: ...these plants only live for a short time.
...getting to the desert is difficult.
...its hard to get the time off of school.
...there is a bee shortage.

questions.question: It would be hard to plan a trip to see a desert ephemeral bloom because...
People from a different clime might be surprised that the desert spring is colorful because...

choices.answer: ...they know like flowers.
...they never leave the house.
...they do not know about the climate in the desert.
...it gets cold at night in the desert.
